sources.data_found: Aries HPC cluster has 43 CPU nodes, 1,208 cores total, two V100 GPU nodes. New NSF-funded ModernCARE HPC: 3 GPU nodes with 2 NVIDIA L40S 48GB GPUs each, and 2 H100 80GB GPU nodes with 2 GPUs each.
Biochemistry and Molecular Biology Department operates 8 GPU servers each using 4 GPUs totaling 32 GPUs.
Student enrollment data sourced from SLU Fall 2023 Student Almanac.
Remote Sensing Lab: Dell PowerEdge R750 with 2 NVIDIA H100 80GB GPUs; Dell Precision 7920 with NVIDIA Quadro RTX 8000.
Gemini Computing Cluster: 344 CPU cores, 80 GPUs, 135 TFLOPs peak.

student_data.notes: Counts derived from the SLU Fall 2023 Student Almanac (Enrollment by Major). Undergraduate count includes Computer Science BS and BA majors. Graduate count includes Computer Science MS and related bio-computing fields. PhD count estimated at 15.

other_high_vram_gpus.notes: Gemini Computing Cluster (Pharmacology/Physiology) lists 80 GPUs with 135 TFLOPs peak, indicating older hardware likely K80s.

gpu_resources.notes: GPU counts aggregated from multiple clusters: 1) ModernCARE HPC (NSF-funded) contributes 4 H100 (assumed SXM based on cluster type) and 6 L40S. 2) Remote Sensing Lab contributes 2 H100 (PCIe/Server-based) and 1 RTX 8000. 3) Aries HPC contributes 2 V100s. 4) Biochemistry Dept contributes 32 GPUs (Models estimated as V100 to align with Aries generation, though some models suggested P100; V100 count used to represent this capacity). 5) Gemini Cluster contributes 80 older GPUs (likely K80).

analysis_notes: Ensemble result aggregated from OpenAI, Claude, and Gemini models. Student data prioritizes 2023-2024 almanac figures over degree-based estimates. GPU resources combine a new NSF-funded cluster (ModernCARE), departmental resources (Biochem, Remote Sensing), and older clusters (Aries, Gemini). Discrepancy regarding the 32 Biochemistry GPUs (estimated as V100 vs P100) resolved by using the higher capability V100 estimate which aligns with the Aries cluster generation.
validation_notes: GPU CHANGES: Removed 4 H100 SXM and 6 L40S GPUs from ModernCARE HPC as it is NSF-funded. Only counting the 2 H100 PCIe GPUs from the Remote Sensing Lab. Student data unchanged.
